title: Spaced Repetition Training Program for Effective Instructional Development and Feedback Skill Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic teaching and feedback skills experience
context.additional_context: Environment where practicing professionals engage in project-based learning with digital devices, receiving continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Participants can apply at least three effective feedback techniques in clinical/educational settings by utilizing weekly feedback skill tips provided over 14 weeks
Participants can develop five or more observation-based assessment items when designing evaluation tools after completing the course

Participants demonstrated a 20% or greater improvement in their ability to engage learners when providing feedback, as confirmed through self-assessment and peer evaluation compared to pre-training levels.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
